ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: Brother, Neighbor, college friend, someone in pasadina you don t even know... Its a game.  You happen to play with your brother, that s wonderful, however EQ
ygData.messageBody:
Brother, Neighbor, college friend, someone in pasadina you don't even
know... Its a game. You happen to play with your brother, that's
wonderful, however EQ is still a game. For you, the ability to
play a game together means you can spend time together. That
is wonderful. This doesn't make EQ more than a game. EQ didn't exist
9 months ago, at some date in the future, EQ will not exist. I hope
you have a contingency plan ready, because EQ is not life, or a way of
life, it is simply a game you enjoy together. Joke all you want that
it is life, fine, no problem. But when you read a post where someone
seriously thinks it is more than a game. Please step back from it
and think about it.

IF EQ was perfect, or something you've been doing for tens of years
and nothing had ever changed on it, then you would have a much better
argument. However we can clearly see that monks aren't being singled
out, almost every class is being tuned every month. This one was
slightly major.

But enough is enough. Shit happens and we adjust. This mailing list
is not about these kinds of posts or this kind of thread.

The purpose of this list is to distribute information about Monks to the players of EverQuest. Spoilers may be included so read at your own risk.

The purpose of this list is NOT to be a vent for your fustration.



> From: Crysarra de'Danann <lucretia_71@...>
>
> Its not about "chatting"!!! I don't need some lame ass chat room to
> talk to him. I get bored to death with ICQ and chats and all that
> stupid crap!! Its not even about talking...its about doing something
> together....the working together. We don't have anything to do
> together besides talking about "well so have you talked to dad lately?
> or how's mom doing?" BORING!!! BUT when we are in EQ we fight mobs
> together and I trust him completely..he is my brother! I love him more
> than anyone. We just don't have much to say and this way its like he
> lives near me and I can do things with him all the time. Last time I
> saw him...we sat and played diablo all day or something. This is
> something we enjoy doing together! And for your info..yes I have been
> in Lower guk fighting and carrying on a coversation with him....guess I
> am just multi-tasking...or something.
>
> --- Robert Hillyer <robhillyer@...> wrote:
> > If the only reason you and your brother talk to each other is because
> > you
> > are both in EQ than you have a serious relationship problem. You
> > could chat
> > in e-mail or ICQ but you say you dont have the time. For your own
> > brother?
> > Yet you go ingame and use it like a chat room, doing nothing but
> > sending
> > messages back and forth. You can't tell me you are in Sol B fighting
> > whatever while you chat with him. I've tried carrying on
> > conversations while
> > fighting and it doesn't work real well. So you sit in game and chat
> > but you
> > have no time to sit out of game and chat. With your own family.....
> > That
> > doesnt make EQ more than a game, just a game with a chat
> > feature......
> >
>
